title: Stuart Mitchell - Operations research and Optimization in Python using Pulp
description:
Operations research and optimization in Python using Pulp

Presented by Stuart Mitchell

Abstract

Operations research has the catch phrase "The science of better". In
this talk we will discuss what a linear programming problem is and how
to solve one using the pulp-or package.

Outline

TBA hopefully to include a relevant example possibly a python
implementation of graphviz.
